item.title: Wolvctf 2025 writeup
item.description: Javascript Puzzle It is often useful to force exceptions to potentially get back valuable information. Can you make a request which causes an exception in this app? app.js const express = require('express') const app = express() const port = 8000 app.get('/', (req, res) => { try { const username = req.query.username || 'Guest' const output = 'Hello ' + username res.send(output) } catch (error) { res.sendFile(__dirname + '/flag.txt') } }) app.
